fields.name: bundesland
fields.description: Federal state (abbreviated) in which the wastewater treatment plant is located.

fields.name: datum
fields.description: Date on which the 24-hour composite sample started in the wastewater treatment plant.

fields.name: viruslast
fields.description: Measured viral load in gene copies per liter.

fields.name: viruslast_normalisiert
fields.description: Flow-normalized viral load (as described in the variable "viruslast").

fields.name: loess_vorhersage
fields.description: Predicted viral load (predicted using a LOESS regression and the non-normalized viral loads, transformed back to the original scale).

fields.name: loess_obere_schranke
fields.description: Upper bound of the pointwise 95% confidence interval of the LOESS predicted value.

fields.name: loess_untere_schranke
fields.description: Lower bound of the pointwise 95% confidence interval of the LOESS predicted value.

fields.name: einwohner
fields.description: Number of inhabitants connected to the site's sewage treatment plant.

fields.name: laborwechsel
fields.description: Indicates whether change in laboratory or change in laboratory mathods occurred.

fields.name: unter_bg
fields.description: Indicates if at least half of the measured genes are under the limit of quantification  (`ja`=yes, `nein`=no).
